gc - gc7.2d
gc-old1 - gc7.2.alpha6
     Boehm-Weiser conservative collector
     http://www.hpl.hp.com/personal/Hans_Boehm/gc/
libpng - libpng-1.5.7
     PNG image library used by <img> library
     http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html
zlib - zlib-1.2.5 
     compression library used by libpng 
     (and other programs like openssl)
     http://zlib.net/

----------------------------------------------------------------------
No longer used:

qt - Qt 4.6.3, multimedia and interaction library
     replaced by libpng and zlib with v0007, c0 repository
